title: Phillip hughes has died.

embed.description: PHILLIP Hughes has died from head injuries suffered on Tuesday when he was hit in the head by a bouncer at the SCG, Cricket Australia has announced. The Australian cricketer underwent brain surgery and has been has been in an induced coma in Sydney's St Vincent's Hospital.

body:
I know this isnt league related, so i have put this in miscellaneous.

Such a sad day for cricket. He was a great cricketer thats for sure.

replies.body: It's sad to see someone great die. R.I.P Philllip Hughes.
A genuinely unfortunate accident. Love to his friends & family.
Definitely a sad day for cricket.
Thoughts have to go out to Sean Abbott though, being the person who threw the ball, one couldn't imagine how he must've felt.
